text: I had assumed that Julia was named after Julia Sets which were named after French mathematician Gaston Julia.  Then I learned that the name didn't have any particular meaning which made me wonder if it was named after someone's romantic partner and when they later broke up the name was too entrenched to change :man-shrugging:

elements.text: I had assumed that Julia was named after Julia Sets which were named after French mathematician Gaston Julia.  Then I learned that the name didn't have any particular meaning which made me wonder if it was named after someone's romantic partner and when they later broke up the name was too entrenched to change

text: Yeah, though I suppose it might not be hurt to embrace the myth that it was Gaston Julia and/or the Julia Set! Would cut down on the tendency of those who don’t know better to want to gender the name.
